attributes.action: Remove VAT from renewable energy equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
VAT should not be charged to the tax payer for trying to help the environment. Rather than offer subsidisation that is only given to a lucky few open the door for many to help the world.
Or paint all our roofs white!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
